text: Converts a primitive/vertex pair into a point number.
int primpoint(<geometry>, int primnum, int vertex)
When running in the context of a node (such as a wrangle SOP), this argument can be an integer representing the input number (starting at 0) to read the geometry from.
Alternatively, the argument can be a string specifying a geometry file (for example, a
) to read from. When running inside Houdini, this can be an
The primitive number to get a vertex from.
The vertex number inside of a primitive.  0 is the first vertex.

The point number the vertex is wired to.
    Returns
if failed to find the corresponding point.

title: primpoint
summary: Converts a primitive/vertex pair into a point number.
